title: About Me
institute: Institute of Geography and Regional Science

question&answer.question: What is my research interest?
question&answer.answer: Public Participatory Geographic Information Systems (PPGIS), 3D, Human-Computer Interaction, Spatial Data Science & Visualization, Emerging Technologies, Digital Twin, and Urban Participatory Planning.

question&answer.question: What are cool stuff I use?
question&answer.answer: Kepler, DuckDB, PostGIS, Lonboard, Vue.js, Cessium.js, and more.

question&answer.question: What is my productivity stack?
question&answer.answer: Raycast, Arc, ClickUp, Perplexity, VSCode, JupyterLab, and Git.
